titleStmt.title: The [s]ceptical chymist, or, Chymico-physical doubts & paradoxes touching the spagyrist's principles commonly call'd hypostatical, [a]s they are wont to be propos'd and defended by the generality of alchymists : whereunto is præmis'd part of another discourse relating to the same subject / by the Honourable Robert Boyle.
titleStmt.author: Boyle, Robert, 1627-1691.

titleStmt.title: The [s]ceptical chymist, or, Chymico-physical doubts & paradoxes touching the spagyrist's principles commonly call'd hypostatical, [a]s they are wont to be propos'd and defended by the generality of alchymists : whereunto is præmis'd part of another discourse relating to the same subject / by the Honourable Robert Boyle.
titleStmt.author: Boyle, Robert, 1627-1691.

publicationStmt.publisher: [Pri]nted by J. Cadwell for J. Crooke ...,

notesStmt.note: Part 2 ([2], 35-442p.) has special t.p.: The Sceptical chymist, or, Chymico-physical doubts & paradoxes : touching the experiments whereby vulgar spagyrists are wont to endeavour to evince their salt, sulphur and mercury, to be the true principles of things.
Imperfect: tightly bound, with some loss of print. Bracketed letters on t.p. supplied by NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
